episode.title: AirPower, What’s That?
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Serenity Caldwell returns to the show for a post-WWDC wrap-up discussion. Topics include iOS 12, Memoji, Siri Shortcuts, Screen Time, Apple Books, MacOS 10.14 Mojave, dark mode, UIKit apps on the Mac, and more.
episode.showNotes:
Serenity Caldwell returns to the show for a post-WWDC wrap-up discussion. Topics include iOS 12, Memoji, Siri Shortcuts, Screen Time, Apple Books, MacOS 10.14 Mojave, dark mode, UIKit apps on the Mac, and more.

Sponsored by:

  • Casper: You can be sure of your purchase with Casper’s 100 night risk-free, sleep-on-it trial.
  • Squarespace: Make your next move. Visit squarespace.com/talkshow and enter code talkshow for 10% off your first order.
  • Tres Pontas: Freshly-roasted coffee from a single farm in Brazil, shipped directly to you. Use code THETALKSHOW at checkout and save an extra 10 percent on any subscription.

Links:

  • “Serenity, did you really roller skate around WWDC? You were in dress clothes!”
  • Agenda interview with Serenity and Rene Ritchie.
  • Steven Aquino’s “Accessibility” podcast interview with members of Apple’s accessibility team.
  • Louie Mantia’s Memoji take on “Inside Out”.
  • Federico Viticci on iOS 12’s Shortcuts.
  • Gross iOS-style dialog boxes in Mojave’s UIKit apps: exhibits A and B.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
